(:action catch
  ; Perform an action to capture, find, or select an item
  :parameters (?p - player ?item - object ?loc - location)
  :precondition (and 
                  (or (in_wild ?item) (at ?p ?loc) (owned ?p))
                  (not (or (in_bag ?item) (bag_selected ?item))))
  :effect (and 
           (or (caught ?item) (in_bag ?item) (bag_selected ?item))

(:action use ; Use an item or resource to achieve an effect
  :parameters (?agent - entity ?target - entity ?item - object)
  :precondition (and (owned ?target) (in_inventory ?item) (inventory_selected ?agent))
  :effect (and (effect_applied ?target) (not (in_inventory ?item))
